plans.title: High Knees

meals.breakfast: Oat power bowl with blueberries, chia seeds, and Greek yogurt for slow-release carbs and protein.
meals.lunch: Brown-rice chicken salad with avocado, mixed greens, and a lemon-olive oil dressing.
meals.dinner: Steamed salmon with broccoli and sweet-potato mash to support recovery.

plans.trainingDuration: 45-minute HIIT: high knees 60s on / 30s off, 6 total rounds.

plans.title: Rope Climb

meals.breakfast: Whole-grain toast with almond butter, soft-boiled eggs, and fresh orange slices.
meals.lunch: Quinoa beef bowl with bell pepper, peas, and carrots for extra iron and vitamin C.
meals.dinner: Miso soup with tofu, seaweed, spinach, and a side of brown rice.

plans.trainingDuration: 60-minute strength block: 8 rope-climb sets paired with upper-pull drills.

plans.title: Tire Push

meals.breakfast: Protein shake (whey, banana, peanut butter) plus a handful of walnuts.
meals.lunch: Whole-wheat beef pasta with broccoli for steady energy.
meals.dinner: Roasted chicken legs with baked pumpkin, beetroot, and arugula.

plans.trainingDuration: 40-minute power session: push tire 15m × 10 sets, 90-second rest.

meals.breakfast: Banana-peanut butter wrap with a glass of low-fat milk.
meals.lunch: Mediterranean baked-fish wrap with hummus and veggies to keep fats balanced.
meals.dinner: Tomato beef stew with brown rice and seasonal greens to refill glycogen.

plans.title: Boxing

meals.breakfast: Spinach-cheese omelet with kiwi juice for extra vitamin C.
meals.lunch: Thai-style chicken brown-rice bowl with green papaya salad for protein and fiber.
meals.dinner: Avocado shrimp whole-wheat tacos with purple cabbage.

plans.trainingDuration: 90-minute boxing mix: 10-min jump-rope warm-up, 6 heavy-bag rounds, 4 sparring rounds.

plans.title: Battle Rope

meals.breakfast: Açaí bowl with granola and strawberries for antioxidants.
meals.lunch: Steamed cod with roasted Italian vegetables and brown rice (lean protein focus).
meals.dinner: Sesame tofu chilled noodles with cucumber and carrot strips.

plans.trainingDuration: 35-minute interval loop: battle ropes 40s on / 20s off, 5 rounds × 3 sets.

plans.title: Supine Twist

meals.breakfast: Greek yogurt parfait layered with granola and raspberries for probiotics.
meals.lunch: Chicken breast cabbage rolls with purple-sweet-potato mash for low GI fuel.
meals.dinner: Mushroom beef soup with roasted asparagus and a small whole-grain roll.

plans.trainingDuration: 30-minute core block: supine twists 20 reps × 4 sets, plus planks and side planks.
